name: Cabbage Salad II
author: MOLSON7
summary: Cabbage, carrot and bell pepper are marinated in a light dressing, and tossed with fresh crumbled bacon just before serving. One of our favorite summer salads. To make it easy, I use a food processor for the shredding.
ingredients: 1 small head green cabbage, cored and shredded
1 small green bell pepper, seeded and chopped
directions: In a large bowl, toss together the cabbage, carrot, green pepper and onion
In a small bowl, whisk together the mayonnaise, vinegar, sugar and salt
Pour over the cabbage mixture, and toss to coat
Cover and refrigerate for at least 4 hours, or overnight
Place the bacon in a large deep skillet
Cook over medium heat until evenly browned, turning occasionally
Toss crumbled bacon with salad just before serving
